title: ADCB Watch
description: Now, take your bank with you wherever you go with the ADCB Watch App on your Android Watch. Track your bank accounts and credit card transactions absolutely anywhere and at any time straight from your wrist.Things you can do with the ADCB Watch App: 		•	Check Bank Account Balances and Credit Card Limits	•	Track the last 5 transactions To start the ADCB Watch App experience,	•	Download the ADCB Watch App on your Android Phone 	•	Carry out the one-time activation process from your Android Phone	•	And your Android Watch App is ready for use
descriptionHTML:
Now, take your bank with you wherever you go with the ADCB Watch App on your Android Watch. Track your bank accounts and credit card transactions absolutely anywhere and at any time straight from your wrist.
Things you can do with the ADCB Watch App:
• Check Bank Account Balances and Credit Card Limits
• Track the last 5 transactions

To start the ADCB Watch App experience,
• Download the ADCB Watch App on your Android Phone
• Carry out the one-time activation process from your Android Phone
• And your Android Watch App is ready for use
comments: Is this an app or a joke seriously a big bank such as ADCB always last in the line for apps implementation this app is a complete joke has never worked for me not a single time since they lunched it way back, I whish from management of ADCB to check the apps development department quality control which is the worst, not only this app is bad, the main app also bad very bad UI basic not a single new feature.  Dear ADCB, I would be great if you can just download and try other banks apps such as Abu Dhabi First bank, Emirates Dubai bank, Dubai islamic bank, city bank and etc All these banks has smart features Mobile wallet, mobile payment, NFC payments, amazing UI, great watch apps and token apps,  what is your app ecosystem provide from these ? Nothing.  just check the deference in the app management and quality of these apps in terms of design and features, as an ADCB loyal client for a very long time now I and many others requesting you please higher a better dev team than what you have so they can learn something and design any good app for this beloved bank   I'm sure nothing from this complain will reach to the managers from ADCB   Very disappointed
Crashed immediately after entering the customer ID or card number
As i entered customer id,  it crashes.
Crashed immediately after entering customer id. Even though reinstalled it . But still the same
